sourcesContent:
import React,{useEffect, useRef, useState} from 'react' import Header from '../header' import PatientListCard from '../patientListCard' import SubHeader from '../subHeader' import axios from 'axios' export default function PatientList() { const [confirgureData, setConfirgureData] = useState({}) const nameRef = useRef(); const dobRef = useRef(); const sexRef = useRef(); const mbNoRef = useRef(); const aadhaarRef = useRef(); const addressRef = useRef(); const bloodGroupRef = useRef(); const maritalRef = useRef(); const getConfigurations = _ => { axios.get('https://myplusdoctor.med2myhome.com/api/configuration') .then(res=> { setConfirgureData(res.data) }) .catch(err=>console.log(err)) } const handleSubmit = _ =>{ const data = { first_name : nameRef?.current?.value, email : localStorage.getItem('email') || "", dob: dobRef?.current?.value, gender: sexRef.current.value, marital_status: maritalRef.current.value, blood_group: bloodGroupRef.current.value, address: addressRef.current.value, mobile_no: mbNoRef.current.value, adhar_no: aadhaarRef.current.value } axios.post('https://myplusdoctor.med2myhome.com/api/user/addpatient',data) .then(res=>console.log(res.data)) } useEffect(()=>{ getConfigurations(); },[]) return ( <>
